content.p: These pages include key information about the University, such as the University Calendar which incorporates the Charter, Statutes and Ordinances. There are also details of the main University committees and schedule of meetings, together with some information on University policies and regulations. The University Calendar includes the University's Charter, Statutes and Ordinances together with information on the University's history, officers and main committees. Terms of Reference and Constitution of the main University committees. Calendar of Meetings The Office for Students requires the University of Nottingham, as an exempt charity, to publish certain specific information on its website. Links to this information are provided on the Charity Gateway page. The Information Compliance and Records Management section provides advice and assistance about all matters relating to records and information compliance. Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
